thread.title: SKY Devices Expands Its Smartphone Collection by Introducing Two 7-Inch Screen Tablets, and the Company’s First 5-inch Screen LTE Model
thread.title_full: SKY Devices Expands Its Smartphone Collection by Introducing Two 7-Inch Screen Tablets, and the Company’s First 5-inch Screen LTE Model

author: admin
title: SKY Devices Expands Its Smartphone Collection by Introducing Two 7-Inch Screen Tablets, and the Company’s First 5-inch Screen LTE Model
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 9:54 PM Companies mentioned in this article: SKY Devices 
MIAMI BEACH, Fla. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- In September, SKY Devices, the fastest growing smartphone manufacturer in its category in North America, has unveiled three new additions to its existing collection. The three new arrivals include the SKY 5.0L, SKY Devices’ first LTE device, SKY 7.0W and SKY 7.0Q; the company’s first 7-inch tablets, furthering leading-edge quality and design that is made in the U.S. The existing eight models are getting refreshed as well, with new color additions, such as hot pink, SKY blue and gold. 
The three new models are said to put SKY Devices in the front line, leading the segment’s inevitable modernization; The SKY 5.0L is offered in silver and gold, with the latest Android™ Lollipop 5.1 Version; a hi-res 13MP back camera with a 5MP front camera, 8GB ROM memory and 1 GB RAM, with an extendable slot for up to 32GB, and a 5-inch full HD display screen with perfect visibility. The SKY 7.0W, a 7-inch tablet with an extendable slot for up to 64GB, allowing to save and keep all the videos, images and apps a user would need on their phablet, comes with a 5MP back camera and 2MP front camera, 4GB ROM and 512MB RAM, in gold, silver and space grey. The third device, SKY 7.0Q, is a tablet with a 7-inch QHD IPS display, 8MP back camera with a 2MP front camera, 8GB ROM memory and 1 GB RAM, with an extendable slot for up to 32GB, comes in white and silver. 
SKY Devices has introduced its ultramodern line of smartphones early in 2014, and quickly gained popularity among both distributors and end-users in need to a high-quality smartphone at a great price and with reliable, quick customer service. SKY Devices manages to offer all three components with its SKY Squadron, a 1-800 line for all technical questions related to the devices. 
SKY Devices is exhibiting at CTIA Super Mobility 2015 on September 9, 10 & 11, an event offering unrivaled networking opportunities and share leading-edge trends, discoveries and knowledge for the year ahead, in Las Vegas, Nevada, booth #649. The complete collection may be viewed at the shows, online at www.skydevices.com or at authorized dealers’ locations.
